entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
